messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Today is National 'Hunt a Wabbit' Day.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Fluffy Alert

Unidentified furry objects detected coming aboard April Trade Post X-ray. Beware of Adorable-ness.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near April Trade Post X-ray, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown magical entities have been detected near April Trade Post X-ray, please stand-by.
